translations: 书呆子；刻苦用功的学生

sentences.translation: 卡尔德隆是个执着的气候专家。

sentences.sentence: For a dedicated policy wonk, he also spends a lot of time on television.
sentences.translation: 他不光热衷于钻研政策，同时他还会花很多时间来关注电视。

sentences.sentence: When the proposal was released, it was praised as a "wonk-approved" plan that had been run by the experts.
sentences.translation: 这项提案公布后，被赞扬为一项“专家审定的”计划，即由专家策划的计划。
